channel.title: Server help - batch file "Ant not recognized..."
channel.description:
When i try an run my server, I get an error, And ive tryed EVERYTHING i can to try and fix it, I cant.. Code:
@echo off TITLE My servername set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin ant runserver exit
Yet, when i run it i get: the system cannot find the file specified 'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable command or batch file.
Thanks :)

item.title: Server help - batch file "Ant not recognized..."
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

When i try an run my server, I get an error, And ive tryed EVERYTHING i can to try and fix it, I cant…
Code:

@echo off
TITLE My servername
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
ant runserver
exit

Yet, when i run it i get:
the system cannot find the file specified
‘ant’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable command or batch file.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Server help - batch file "Ant not recognized..."
